languages.text: "Пусть обряды Кровавой паутины и кажутся мне радикальными, но я рада, что столь истовая воительница Императора с нами".
"Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent and devout warrior of the Emperor at our side."
languages.original_text: "Пусть обряды Кровавой паутины и кажутся мне радикальными, но я рада, что столь истовая воительница Императора с нами".

traits.locale_text: "Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent warrior of the Emperor at our side."
"Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent warrior of the Emperor at our side."
"Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent and devout warrior of the Emperor at our side."

"Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent and devout warrior of the Emperor at our side."

languages.text: "Die Riten des Blutgesponnenen Netzes erscheinen mir zwar radikal, doch ich bin froh, einen solch inbrünstigen und frommen Krieger des Imperators an meiner Seite zu wissen."
languages.original_text: "Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent and devout warrior of the Emperor at our side."

traits.locale_text: "Die Riten des Blutgesponnenen Netzes erscheinen mir zwar radikal, doch ich bin froh, einen solch inbrünstigen und frommen Krieger des Imperators an meiner Seite zu wissen."

languages.text: « Si les rites de la Toile de Sang me paraissent quelque peu extrêmes, je me réjouis que nous ayons à nos côtés une guerrière aussi fervente et dévouée à l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent and devout warrior of the Emperor at our side."

traits.locale_text: « Si les rites de la Toile de Sang me paraissent quelque peu extrêmes, je me réjouis que nous ayons à nos côtés une guerrière aussi fervente et dévouée à l'Empereur. »

languages.text: «Aunque los ritos de la Red Sanguinolenta me parecen un tanto radicales, me alegro de tener a tan fervorosa y devota guerrera del Emperador a mi lado».
languages.original_text: "Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent and devout warrior of the Emperor at our side."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque los ritos de la Red Sanguinolenta me parecen un tanto radicales, me alegro de tener a tan fervorosa y devota guerrera del Emperador a mi lado».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの儀式は私には過激に思えるけど、このような熱狂的で敬虔な皇帝の戦士がそばにいることをうれしく思うわ」
languages.original_text: "Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent and devout warrior of the Emperor at our side."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの儀式は私には過激に思えるけど、このような熱狂的で敬虔な皇帝の戦士がそばにいることをうれしく思うわ」

languages.text: “尽管对我来说，织血罗网的仪式有点太激进了，但我很高兴能有这样一位狂热而虔诚的战士站在我们身边。”
languages.original_text: "Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent and devout warrior of the Emperor at our side."

traits.locale_text: “尽管对我来说，织血罗网的仪式有点太激进了，但我很高兴能有这样一位狂热而虔诚的战士站在我们身边。”

languages.original_text: "Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent and devout warrior of the Emperor at our side."

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı ayinleri, her ne kadar bana radikal gelse de İmparator'un böylesine coşkulu ve dindar bir savaşçısının bizim tarafımızda olmasından dolayı memnunum."
languages.original_text: "Although the rites of the Bloodspun Web seem radical to me, I am glad to have such a fervent and devout warrior of the Emperor at our side."
